name: Human Experiment
description:
Timmy has been abducted by and alien. You must help Timmy run through the aliens FIVE mazes. Get Timmy to the end by moving and using the obstacles. Only you can ensure Timmy's safety!

Controls:

Left mouse button: Drag and drop the yellow and black checkered obstacles

Right mouse button: Lets Timmy know its safe to run

Middle mouse button: Pauses the game

Made for 8 Bits to infinity Mouse Jam.

Limitation: Game controlled by mouse only input

Theme: Another World
